review: We love this product.  We weren't sure what to expect but have already watched some great shows.  As a Prime Member we are able to enjoy a large number of shows free.  Easy to install and hook up to our home network.  The initial tutorial made it a lot easier to understand how to use and take advantage of all the options on the remote and Amazon Fire TV.
